Events that occurred on 4 October.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1915 - Translator Tore Zetterholm is born.
1953 - Actor Chris Fairbank is born.
1961 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 231.
1965 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Agatha Carew Hunt.
1979 - The Jackanory episode "Out of the Frying-Pan and Into the Fire" is aired on the BBC.
1999 - Poems from The Hobbit is published.
2009 - Ring*Con 2009 in Bonn, Germany.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Together with Strider the four hobbits travel towards Weathertop.
Gandalf hurries towards Rivendell after the Black Riders attacked him on Weathertop.
Boromir travels towards Rivendell to ask for counsel.
